name: soba
description: Soba - AI-Powered DEX Trading Platform with Frontend Integration & A/B Testing Framework

scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:contracts
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:backend -- --coverage && npm run test:frontend -- --coverage --watchAll=false
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:backend -- --ci && npm run test:frontend -- --ci --watchAll=false
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:backend -- --fix && npm run lint:frontend -- --fix
scripts.docker:restart: npm run docker:down && npm run docker:up
scripts.start:prod: npm run build && npm run docker:up
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:build
scripts.setup:dev: npm run setup && npm run build:contracts
scripts.validate: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run test:ci
scripts.audit:all: npm audit && cd backend && npm audit && cd ../frontend && npm audit
scripts.audit:fix: npm audit fix && cd backend && npm audit fix && cd ../frontend && npm audit fix
scripts.outdated: npm outdated && cd backend && npm outdated && cd ../frontend && npm outdated
